title: Elite Trooper

fields.name: Sturdy Kill (Passive):
fields.value: When you attack a player who placed below you in the last Evening, you will ignore 1/4 of their Defense Score. If you were in the Top 3 or the target was in the Bottom 3 as well, you will instead ignore 1/2 of their Defense Score.

fields.name: Cripple (x1, Charge 100%):
fields.value: Target a player, injuring them. They will be roleblocked tonight and the next Night, and will be muted in all of their Hello Neighbors the next Evening.

fields.name: Go Down Fighting (Passive):
fields.value: If you are nightkilled, you will attack anyone who visited you that Night. This passive is lost if you ever score below 35%.
